# isInBillingRetryPeriod

**Type**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the App Store is attempting to automatically renew a subscription that expired due to a billing issue.

## Declaration

```swift
boolean isInBillingRetryPeriod
```

## Billing status

- **gracePeriodExpiresDate**: The time when the billing grace period for a subscription renewal expires.

items.description: The time when the billing grace period for a subscription renewal expires.
